channel.title: Static Site Generator on Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in Static Site Generator on Home Page

item.title: Project IV: Programming Portfolio Website
item.description: The lastest version of the project was uploaded directly to my GitHub Repository. Here you can find only outline of the work. Please look at the GitHub README file to see very detailed documentation describing how the website is built and deployed! Repo includes final rendered HTML files, images and tags needed to build the site. Project scope: Introduction What is Hugo framework? Technology Stack How the site is built and published?
